name: Exit, Pursued By Bear
description:
You, a master thief, are tasked with an insane challenge: rob a series of location that are all patrolled by bloodthirsty guard bears! Can you steal all the loot and exit the building without being mercilessly mauled by mad monstrous bears!

CONTROLS:

WASD - controls movement

Mouse controls camera (Note: You may need to click into the game window to use the mouse properly).

E - pick up item(when on the item)

Shift- Sprint

This game is currently under development, so I'm going to keep making updates. In the mean time, please  try out my first short prototype and leave any feedback in the comments below.

Thank you for your kind attention!
